channel.title: Help with npc transforming
channel.description: ok i added some items and npcs to transform into (wearing item turning you into npc) Well only 1 works... Which is the stone of rock...which turns you into a rock. Well how would i make it where ALL of my items i put in would work...?(the items i want to transform)

item.title: Help with npc transforming

item.description:
@Pizz4_0wnz wrote:

ok i added some items and npcs to transform into (wearing item turning you into npc) Well only 1 works… Which is the stone of rock…which turns you into a rock. Well how would i make it where ALL of my items i put in would work…?(the items i want to transform)
